participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Curious and sociable, enjoys engaging in conversations and asking questions.
participant_1.background: Liam is a marketing professional living in the city, and he often meets new people through his work.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Friendly and open-minded, loves to share experiences and connect with others.
participant_2.background: Sophia is a freelance graphic designer who travels frequently, meeting interesting people along the way.

content.text: What do you do for living?
Have you ever met someone famous?
